alert.note: Alert for Arecibo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 20 at 1:39AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is ongoing on Rio Tanama. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, in the municipality of Arecibo. * WHEN...Until 300 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Low-lying areas will remain flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1233 AM AST, Flooding from water draining up stream from previous heavy rains is ongoing. The river is receding and should be entirely within its banks by 3 AM AST. - The river level at 12:15 AM AST was 11.15 feet. No significant rain is expected tonight. The river level may fluctuate above and below flood stage during this time. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
